ComicInfo.Title: Part Two: Remains
ComicInfo.Summary:
Celebrate the return of The Living Corpse with a special Relics Encore Edition! The reemergence of an ancient evil lures The Living Corpse out of his seclusion at the mysterious monastery in the mountains of Tibet and back into action. Meanwhile the vampire Lilith has found the clan of her fellow Nosferatu, but she may wish she hadn't! All this and the previous Gatekeeper- The Creep of Souls, makes our undead hero an offer he can't refuse! Horror maestros Ken Haeser and Buz Hasson deliver a heavy metal dose of one of the best indie horror comics being published!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Buz Hasson & Ken Haeser | 1 | B | Limited Edition Black & White Raw Edition Variant Cover | Buz Hasson & Ken Haeser | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-17 19:47:50. [CVDB882299]
